attributes.action: Encourage the disabled into the workplace
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people who claim disability benefit are more than able to hold a full time job, but are not required to because they suffer some form of disability - whereas many people with very severe 'disabilities' are fiercly independant and work very hard.  The unwillingness of those with more minor ailments is costing the welfare state millions and in reality, there is no reason why many of these people should not work.  The disablility living allowance is treated as a promotion from being unemployed within some social circles.
